column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I came here on a Thursday for dinner with some people from work and our boss who flew in from Miami (who really has pretty high standards for food). This is a great place to take guests from out of town
column2: at least during the week. The sangria was awesome (try the peach). Beef Tenderloin with Blue Cheese and the Spicy Potatoes are a must! Everyone enjoyed the food and I'll be going back with friends.
